attributes.action: Reverse the decision to select Hillsborough as the preferred venue in Sheffield for the 2018 world cup bid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sheffield is one of 12 cities to be chosen following an intense bid process throughout 2009 where 16 cities battled it out to be part of the England bid. Staging games would see the city benefit from a number of social and economic benefits in the period leading up to and during the event.

Sheffield's bid included both grounds at Sheffield Wednesday and Sheffield United however in announcing Sheffield, England 2018 have also selected the Sheffield Wednesday Football Stadium as their preferred venue to host games in the city.

Lead campaigner Susan Wright said "We are highly disappointing that Bramall Lane, with its obvious benefits and current and planned facilities, has not been recognised by the FA. We would ask that people back our campaign to have this decision reversed"

rejection.details: This is a matter for the FA.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
